name: Kicks Online
description:
Kicks Online 2020 its a free P2P Football game (Freestyle Football), where players can choose to play on hosted rooms modes of 3vs3 - 4vs4 and 5vs5!

Players can choose from a variety of positions when creating their character (Defense , Middle , Forward) at level 18 you choose your final position and it will determine your skills & abilities for your character.

* Easy exp to grow level up faster
* Levels 1 to 60
* Clothes , items and abilities shopping
* Ranking system in the web
* Kash system
* Clubs system
* Create your account from the website or the launcher
* Multiple - Language for the client game (English , Spanish, French , Korean , Chinese , Italian)



Kicks Online Steam Download:

Is suggested to join our groups to find players to make rooms to play with!
